sentences.en: a black beetle
sentences.cn: 黑甲虫

sentences.en: a dung beetle
sentences.cn: 屎壳郎

sentences.en: A firefly is a type of beetle.
sentences.cn: 萤火虫是一种甲虫.

sentences.en: a rare species of beetle
sentences.cn: 一种稀有甲虫

sentences.en: He saw a shiny green beetle on a leaf.
sentences.cn: 我看见树叶上有一只闪闪发光的绿色甲虫.

sentences.en: He spied the beetle; and dropping tail lifted and wagged.
sentences.cn: 它一眼发现了这只甲虫; 它那垂着的尾巴就举起来摇摆着.

sentences.en: He spied the beetle; the drooping tail lifted and wagged.
sentences.cn: 它一眼发现了这只甲虫, 垂着的尾巴立即竖起来,晃动着.

sentences.en: He studied the Namib beetle, an ingenious species that lives in one of the driest places on earth.
sentences.cn: 他研究了纳米布甲虫，这是一种机灵的物种，生活在世界上最干燥的地方之一。

sentences.en: He tickled gently at its glossy carapace,but the stubborn beetle would not budge.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地搔着甲虫光滑的壳，但这只固执的甲虫就是不动。

sentences.en: He trod the golden beetle underfoot.
sentences.cn: 他把一只金色的甲虫踩在脚下.

sentences.en: Look at the beautiful beetle!
sentences.cn: 看那只漂亮的甲虫!

sentences.en: Other people uninterested in the sermon found relief in the beetle, and they eyed it too.
sentences.cn: 其他的人对牧师的布道也不感兴趣,就拿这只甲虫来解闷, 他们也盯着它看.

sentences.en: Pupils like the beetle very much.
sentences.cn: 小学生们很喜欢甲虫.

sentences.en: The beetle is, in fact, less elongate.
sentences.cn: 这种甲虫实际上不太长.

sentences.en: The first thing the beetle did was to take him by the finger.
sentences.cn: 它一被放出来,就咬汤姆的手指.

sentences.en: The weevil is a shiny, cylindrical beetle.
sentences.cn: 象甲科害虫是一种发光的圆柱形甲虫.

sentences.en: There was a nice lively beetle inside each case.
sentences.cn: 不过每个表壳里都有个活叩头虫.

sentences.en: This beetle eats mainly the germ of the grain.
sentences.cn: 这种甲虫主要吃谷物的胚芽.

sentences.en: While other bugs may change color due to external circumstances like temperature, the Panamanian tortoise beetle is one of the few creatures known to control its own color changing.
sentences.cn: 据了解，其他小虫可能是随着外部环境（如：气温）的变化而变色的，但巴拿马龟甲虫是可以控制自身颜色变化的少数动物之一。

sentences.en: With half an inch of rain per year, the beetle can only survive by consuming the dew it collects on the hydrophilic skin of its back in the early mornings.
sentences.cn: 它的生活地每年只有半英尺的降雨量，这种甲虫可以通过使用它背部具吸水性的皮肤在早晨收集的水露存活下来。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 蜣螂；金龟子科；甲虫

trans.tran_en: an insect with a round hard back that is usually black
